content:
From: "W. Douglas Maurer" <maurer@gwu.edu>
I hope you're not going to try and force everyone to use the same
layout. That goes against what happens in other segments of the
computing world. Yes, if you work for a large corporation, they have
their standard layout, and everybody who works for that corporation
has to use that layout -- but the layout of every large corporation
is different from that of every other large corporation, so there are
lots of different layouts out there. -WDMaurer

From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
No worries, you won't be forced to use those layout rules ;-)

The idea is to provide a consistent set for orientation, not to force anything on people.

Cheers,
Gerwin
